title: Zte Zmax 4.4 Rooted
comment: O yes..this works...Great Volume booster!! Thanks

title: It freezes, and force closes on my device.
comment: But it performed the tasks I asked it to
Love it

title: Waste of time!
comment: Nav and music running,  it doesn't work at all.  Bogus!
Doesn't work

title: Good app with control/notification issues
comment: Overall this is a good app, particularly for dealing with volume and orientation issues. There are some control issues however. The app has notifications to tell you when it's running that can be turned on, off, or only in use. That said I see an icon in my notification bar all the time. Even when the notifications should be turned off an icon sits there which I hate to see. The addition of a widget for easy on/off would also be incredibly helpful. Lastly whenever i make changes to app controls, particularly volume boost, I have to reboot my phone before I see them take effect which is a little frustrating.   This app covers the role of individual app setting that android should do by default and does and ok job.

title: Don't work
comment: It has NO control over control at all

title: Interesting, still needs more features.
comment: I like where this is going, it's still a bit unstable though. It's already been said, but a must have feature is for full volume control, not just boosting. I would be able to use this app almost to my content as it does have many other useful and unique features, but it doesn't have a complete app list. Ala, things like Google and Samsung TTS, other 'hidden' programs.  If we had a more comprehensive list, then I think this app would be usable if not necessary for all power users regardless of a few missing features.

title: Doesn't work on 4.3 cm10.2
comment: Orientation doesn't work. Haven't tried anything else

Fantastic per-app volume control. Nothing else like it available! Crashes.	It appears to work and I think that is fantastic. I *want* my GPS to be loud in the car, but I *don't* want my Candy Crush blasting everyone in the room. Problem solved! I just disable cpu and all other functions except volume control, set default at 12, then set some individual apps to 1!  Version 1.03 on my Note 2 with Samsung 4.1.2.. if I exit and go back in, it hangs and the system asks me to end or wait etc... it never recovers unless I end the app and relaunch it. My CPU graph shows all four cores barely used when this is happening.

title: Doesn't work...
comment: Well, at least volume boost doesn't work on my S3 and it's the only reason I downloaded it. And yes, I am rooted.

title: It just doesn't work
comment: Orientation just toggles the stock orientation. For example, Tetris can't be played on landscape unless you use Set Orientation, because it overrides the system orientation setting. This just toggles that. And to top it all off, it doesn't even return to the previous setting even after going out of the app.

title: Needs some more features
comment: I thought this was going to be able to adjust volume on apps not just boost the volume. Also this can use a wifi feature like turn on wifi per app.
Weird / z

title: Free, Open source, and does work
comment: Works for me on my HTC Desire HD.

title: Ftw!
comment: I can't believe I haven't rated this yet lol I've had it since it 1st came out. 5+ starts for sure! Thanks for making this!!

title: Doesn't work.
comment: I was excited to find an app that would let me control the volume of individual apps, but the volume boost setting doesn't affect volume at all. Orientation lock doesn't work either. This app literally does nothing.

title: Jellybean
comment: Great app. Isn't working on my Samsung galaxy note 10.1 since the jellybean update though.

title: Crashes on Nexus 4
comment: I couldn't use it long enough to tell if it is any good.

title: Buggy with Nexus 7
comment: A great concept but the execution seems poor, at least on my Nexus 7.  Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't.  And sometimes it crashes the whole system.  I can't tell if there is a conflict with other apps with similar functions or the app itself is buggy, so I had to uninstall it.  But I like the concept a lot - per app, literally - and hopefully it gets more polished in the future.

title: Very Good App
comment: I used it for force orientation for certain apps...tasker does not do that....one fix is needed as i couldnot change the default orientation from automatic to landscape, the makes autorotate is auto set to on  unless i manually set it to off every time my device boots....

title: using it just for orientation control, perfect
comment: I just wanted to get office documents like spreadsheets to open in landscape, with everything else on portrait. This manages it perfectly.

title: Oh well
comment: I was excited because i thought i could disable screen timeout but I can only set it for 12 minutes

title: Great!
comment: Using it to lock screen orientation on a per app basis and works great.  Can't speak for the other features, didn't need them.

title: It is a great app
comment: Does what it claims and do it good. Caution though as with all apps with more power than some user can control. It is not for everyone. Don't blame the software for lack of knowledge.
Awesome app!
